mention.text: president barco vigorously defended colombia 's image regarding its struggle against drug trafficking
the problem of a single nation
we -- all presidents of the american hemisphere , along with president bush and our other colleagues of those nations most affected by the international drug trafficking scourge --
nations affected by drug trafficking in order to respond effectively
